title: Blacktown Sydney Family-Friendly Stay near Sydney Zoo & with Onsite Cafe
description:
Discover the best of Sydney's west with a stay at this modern hotel, perfectly positioned near the WRaging Waters water park and the expansive Sydney Zoo. This contemporary hotel offers the ideal base for family-friendly adventures, with an onsite cafe and parking available.

If youâ€™re seeking retail therapy, the bustling Westpoint Blacktown shopping centre is just a short drive away, and sports fans will delight at the Blacktown International Sportspark. After a day of exploring, retreat to the comfortable rooms to relax and unwind.
offer_address: 170 Reservoir Road, Arndell Park, Blacktown, New South Wales 2148, Australia
